page.title: 10BREAN LEISURE CENTRE (1)
page.content: The Brean Leisure Centre is a large centre,with plenty of facilities.There are lots to entertain you,when you go there.The main facilities are a cafeteria and fast food takeaway and Bar-B-Q,patio bar,gift shop and an Indoor Heated Swimming Pool.Outside is an amusement park which includes lots of rides which are Dodgems,Bumper-Boats,Go Karts,Slippery Dip,Luna-Jets and Roundabouts.The actual amusement arcade has all the latest machines and also runs a prize bingo. The golf course outside has nine holes,at the moment this is being extended to eighteen holes.There is also a pitch and putt and a crazy golf course.The cost annually at the golf club is one hundred and three pounds, but you don't have to pay an additional joining fee.Cont (2)
